task.title: View an Object
task.shortdesc: View individual objects stored in the system from the Object Browser page.

step.cmd: Open the Object Browser page, by clicking the Object Browser icon in the left navigation bar.
Click the drop-down arrow on the Data Source field and select the data source containing the object.
step.info: The available objects are listed in the Objects text box. Each object has the original file name it had on ingest, prepended with the system key that has assigned.

step.cmd: Select the object you want to view, scrolling through the list as necessary.
step.info: Once selected, the object's information is retrieved and displays with the Metadata tab initially showing.

choices.choice: View the object's metadata on the Metadata tab.
View any data elements derived by executing a DPF on the original data by clicking the Digital Assets tab.
View a hexadecimal and ASCII representation of the original data object by clicking the Raw Data tab.
